channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: Scale AI confirms ‘significant’ investment from Meta, says CEO Alexandr Wang is leaving
item.description: Data-labeling firm Scale AI confirmed on Friday that it has received a "significant" investment from Meta that values the startup at $29 billion.

item.title: Here’s What Marines and the National Guard Can (and Can’t) Do at LA Protests
item.description: Pentagon rules sharply limit US Marines and National Guard activity in Los Angeles, prohibiting arrests, surveillance, and other customary police work...

item.title: 9 Best 2-in-1 Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These 2-in-1 computers upgrade the norm with touchscreen displays, 360-degree hinges, and detachable keyboards.

item.title: 33 Best Gifts for Teens (2025), Approved by Our Kids
item.description: Teenagers can be scary and impossible to shop for. These adolescent-approved gifts can help.

item.title: Iconiq VCs spent two years courting Chime and the firm isn’t selling its stake
item.description: Iconiq pursued Chime because the founders were focused, and didn’t get distracted by "shiny new objects."

item.title: What to expect at TechCrunch All Stage: One day, countless connections and takeaways
item.description: Whether you’re a founder gearing up for your next raise or a VC scouting your next portfolio win, TechCrunch All Stage, happening July 15 at Boston’s ...

item.title: 11 startups from YC Demo Day that investors are talking about
item.description: Here are some of the top startups from Y Combinator's Spring 2025 Demo Day that caught investors' and our attention.

item.title: 5 Best Totes for Travel in 2025, Tested and Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: These hard-working travel totes handle everything from a work trip to a weekend getaway.

item.title: After a string of successes, early-stage fund Felicis raises fresh $900M
item.description: Lately, Felicis, like most VCs, has been all over AI. Its portfolio now includes, for example, Browser Use, Poolside, Runway, and Supabase.
